mapper.select: select sd.org_code, sd.depart_name from stock_submit_plan stock_submit_plan left join sys_depart sd on stock_submit_plan.org_code = sd.org_code group by sd.org_code order by sd.create_time desc

SELECT id, CODE, YEAR, submit_type, org_id, org_code, user_id, submit_time, STATUS, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, del_flag FROM stock_submit_plan WHERE CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{str},'%') ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1;
